title: Existing features shown on the plan - The existing features shown on Development / Regional Plan are indicative and shall stand modified on Development / Regional Plan / Planning Proposal as per actual situation
clause_text: Existing features shown on the plan - The existing features shown on Development / Regional Plan are indicative and shall stand modified on Development / Regional Plan / Planning Proposal as per actual situation. Mention of particular use on Development / Regional Plan shall not bar the owner from permission to develop land as allowed in the zone shown for such land. Also, boundaries of S.No., alignment of existing road / nallah and other physical features of land shall be as per measurement plan of Land Records Department and the land unaffected by such physical features shall be allowed to be developed for the uses permissible under the adjoining predominant land use zone.
section: 3.13 DEVELOPMENT OF CYCLE TRACK ALONG RIVER AND NALLAH

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
